thread.title: BRIEF-Reliance Communications Says Shareholders Of Co Approve Asset Monetization

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Reliance Communications Says Shareholders Of Co Approve Asset Monetization

organizations.name: brief-reliance communications says shareholders of co approve asset monetization feb 16

text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Reliance Communications Ltd:
* SAYS SHAREHOLDERS OF CO APPROVE ASSET MONETIZATION * COâ€˜S ASSET MONETIZATION PROCEEDING ON FAST TRACK TO CLOSE BY MARCH 2018
* POST MONETIZATION, DEBT AND LIABILITIES TO REDUCE BY ABOUT 250 BILLION RUPEES Source text - bit.ly/2EvsChD Further company coverage:
